summary: VERY SNOWY WHERE I LIVE, WHENEVER I HIT ICE AND BRAKE THE ABS WILL KICK ON AND OFF LIKE ITS SPOSSED TO. AFTER THE ABS DOES ITS JOB THE PEDAL GETS VERY SOFT FOR QUITE A LONG TIME. IT ISNT UNTIL THE NEXT DAY THE PEDAL IS FULLY HARD. ONE TIME THE ABS WAS WORKING THE PEDAL WENT ALL THE WAY TO THE FLOOR.
